update t_sim set iccid = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sim = #{sim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imsi = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, package_sn = #{packageSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_info = #{packageInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_period = #{packagePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_usage = #{amountUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, month_usage = #{monthUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, surplus_usage = #{surplusUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, surplus_period = #{surplusPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, first_active = #{firstActive,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_active = #{lastActive,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_reset = #{isReset,jdbcType=TINYINT}, real_name_status = #{realNameStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fresh_date = #{freshDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
